name: Amalfi Coast
description: A luxurious fictional seaside location featured in the film 'Tenet.'

content.title: Geography
content.body: The **Amalfi Coast** is depicted as a picturesque seaside region characterized by stunning cliffs, clear blue waters, and elegant villas. It is situated in an indeterminate geographic region in the world of 'Tenet,' echoing the real-world Amalfi Coast in Italy.

content.title: Notable Features
content.body:
- **Luxury Villas**: Expansive and opulent, these villas overlook the sea, offering a backdrop for key interactions.
- **Private Beaches**: Secluded beaches provide a setting for private meetings and character development.
- **Yacht Marinas**: Serving as a docking place for elegant yachts, highlighting the wealth associated with the location.

content.title: Story Significance
content.body: The **Amalfi Coast** plays a vital role in 'Tenet' as the setting for crucial meetings between characters, revealing critical narrative developments. It provides a serene yet dramatic backdrop that contrasts with the complexity of the plot, enhancing the thematic elements of time, luxury, and intrigue.
